document_data.name: Yklwazi Hill
document_data.mainbody: '''Yklwazi Hill''' ({{Pronounce|yick|ul|WAH|zee|refs = }}), meaning "hill of blades", was one of the four hills in [[Chult]] atop which [[Port Nyanzaru]] was built.
document_data.Description: The top of Yklwazi Hill was dominated by the city's [[Grand Coliseum]]. Its slopes were characterized by terraces and steep, stepped streets.
